ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Jan__c<0 || Jan__c>1 || Feb__c<0 || Feb__c>1 || Mar__c<0 || Mar__c>1 || Apr__c<0 || Apr__c>1 || May__c<0 || May__c>1 || Jun__c<0 || Jun__c>1 || Jul__c<0 || Jul__c>1 || Aug__c<0 || Aug__c>1 || Sep__c<0 || Sep__c>1 || Oct__c<0 || Oct__c>1 || Nov__c<0 || Nov__c>1 || Dec__c<0 || Nov__c>1
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Availability must be in between 0 and 100
